attacks.text: Move as many Psychic Energy attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Night Scan
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. This attack does 30 more damage for each Trainer card you find there. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Dizzying Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Powder
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Aromatherapy
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magical Leaf
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bone Rush
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Dual Claw
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Dragon Blast
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy and 1 Lightning Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shining Eyes
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Epic Splash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Sonic Vision
abilities.text: If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokémon's attacks.

attacks.name: Assault Boom
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Power Heater
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokémon.

abilities.name: Mega Boost
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hyperspace Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Portal Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Portal Strike during your next turn.

abilities.name: Aroma of Gratitude
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 20 damage from each of your Benched Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Floral Gain
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Break Through
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: X Blast
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use X Blast during your next turn.

attacks.name: Evil Ball

attacks.name: Y Cyclone
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Land's Pulse
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Cell Storm
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rumble
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Geostrike
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Shining Flame
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Shining Flame during your next turn. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Right Back at You
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Aeroblast
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Hazard Stinger
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

name: Beedrill Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Beedrill-EX.

attacks.name: Frosty Thunder
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Lightning Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached to it, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Shred

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Steam Up
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic Fire Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Mystic Heart

attacks.name: Soul Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Soul Blaster attack's base damage is 60.

name: Champions Festival
rules: Once during each player's turn, if that player has 6 Pokémon in play, they may heal 10 damage from each of their Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Karen
rules: Each player shuffles all Pokémon in his or her discard pile into his or her deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Lamentation
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Shadow Cage

abilities.name: Immunity
